statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT route_id, SUM(distance_traveled) AS total_distance FROM transportation_energy_usage GROUP BY route_id
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_consumption FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE fuel_consumption >= 10.0 ORDER BY fuel_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(fuel_consumption) AS avg_fuel_consumption FROM transportation_energy_usage
SELECT * FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE fuel_consumption > 10 ORDER BY date DESC, distance_traveled ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_consumption, distance_traveled FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE route_id = 3 ORDER BY fuel_consumption DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, date FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE distance_traveled < 1000 AND date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT SUM(fuel_consumption) AS total_fuel_consumption, AVG(distance_traveled) AS avg_distance FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE route_id IN (1, 2, 4)
SELECT * FROM transportation_energy_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY route_id ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Transportation;
SELECT Vehicle_Type, Distance_Traveled FROM Transportation ORDER BY Vehicle_Type ASC;
SELECT Fuel_Consumption FROM Transportation WHERE Distance_Traveled > 100 ORDER BY Fuel_Consumption DESC;
SELECT Route_ID, Optimal_Route FROM RouteOptimization WHERE CO2_Reduction > 50;
SELECT AVG(Fuel_Savings) AS Average_Fuel_Savings FROM RouteOptimization GROUP BY Optimization_Date;
SELECT * FROM Transportation WHERE Vehicle_Type = 'Car';
SELECT Route_ID, Optimal_Route FROM RouteOptimization WHERE Fuel_Savings > 100 ORDER BY CO2_Reduction DESC;
SELECT ID, Distance_Traveled, Fuel_Consumption FROM Transportation WHERE Distance_Traveled BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT Route_ID, Count(Route_ID) AS Total_Optimizations FROM RouteOptimization GROUP BY Route_ID HAVING Count(Route_ID) > 3;
SELECT ID, Vehicle_Type, Route_ID, Distance_Traveled, Fuel_Consumption FROM Transportation JOIN RouteOptimization ON Transportation.Route_ID = RouteOptimization.Route_ID;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT route_name, vehicle_type FROM transportation_routes JOIN energy_consumption ON transportation_routes.route_id = energy_consumption.route_id;
SELECT * FROM optimization_results WHERE fuel_saved_liters > 50 ORDER BY time_saved_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A'
SELECT route_name, distance_km, vehicle_type FROM transportation_routes INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON transportation_routes.route_id = energy_consumption.route_id WHERE fuel_consumed_liters < 50

SELECT route_name, time_saved_minutes FROM transportation_routes INNER JOIN optimization_results ON transportation_routes.route_id = optimization_results.route_id WHERE time_saved_minutes > 30 ORDER BY time_saved_minutes ASC
SELECT MAX(fuel_saved_liters) AS max_fuel_saved FROM optimization_results
SELECT * FROM TransportationSystem;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_consumption FROM TransportationSystem WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM Routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT route_id, optimization_score FROM OptimizationResults WHERE optimization_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM TransportationSystem ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;

SELECT ts.vehicle_type, r.start_location, r.end_location, eu.energy_consumed FROM TransportationSystem ts JOIN Routes r ON ts.route_id = r.route_id JOIN EnergyUsage eu ON ts.vehicle_id = eu.vehicle_id WHERE eu.energy_consumed < 50;

SELECT r.start_location, r.end_location, eu.energy_consumed, o.optimization_score FROM Routes r JOIN EnergyUsage eu ON r.route_id = eu.route_id JOIN OptimizationResults o ON r.route_id = o.route_id WHERE eu.energy_consumed > 30 AND o.optimization_score > 0.8;

SELECT ts.vehicle_id, ts.vehicle_type, r.start_location, r.end_location, eu.energy_consumed, o.optimization_score FROM TransportationSystem ts JOIN Routes r ON ts.route_id = r.route_id JOIN EnergyUsage eu ON ts.vehicle_id = eu.vehicle_id JOIN OptimizationResults o ON r.route_id = o.route_id WHERE eu.energy_consumed > 20 AND o.optimization_score < 0.5 ORDER BY ts.vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TransportationSystems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM TransportationSystems WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes LIMIT 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_efficiency FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT * FROM TransportationSystems ORDER BY system_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_efficiency FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT system_name FROM TransportationSystems WHERE system_type IN ('Railway', 'Bus');
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT route_name, energy_consumed FROM Routes JOIN EnergyUsage ON Routes.route_id = EnergyUsage.route_id ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
